content.description: Central star - authentic PDP-1 point-flicker rendering

source.algorithm: LFSR random scatter around center point, single dpy-4000 commands
source.notes: Original was NOT radiating rays - it was scattered points creating a flicker effect through phosphor persistence

authentic_algorithm.description: The original uses LFSR random values to scatter display points around center
authentic_algorithm.interpretation: Random offset applied to center, then single point displayed. Multiple points per frame create scatter effect.

fallback_rendering.description: For runtimes without LFSR support, a simple bright dot with slight jitter

content.rendering_notes: Authentic: Use LFSR to generate scatter points around center each frame. The phosphor persistence creates the 'radiating' effect naturally. Runtime may use fallback if LFSR not available.
